text: Israel Beltrán Montes (29 March 1947 – 2 March 2022) was a Mexican businessman and politician. He was a member of the Institutional Revolutionary Party (PRI). He was a Deputy in the Congress of the Union from 1991 until 1994 and again from 2006 until 2009. Beltrán Montes was born in Chihuahua City, Mexico. Beltrán Montes died on 2 March 2022 in Chihuahua City from problems caused by COVID-19, aged 74.Fallece Israel Beltrán, empresario radiofónico y destacado político cuauhtemense ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Mexican businesspeople Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico Category:Politicians from Chihuahua (state)
title: Israel Beltrán Montes
